bomberMan.gamePlay.Model

Class PowerUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberMan.gamePlay.Model.GameObject
      • bomberMan.gamePlay.Model.PowerUp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Position, java.io.Serializable

    public class PowerUp
extends GameObject
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements a set of methods that allow the creation of a PowerUp object object in a game board. The documentation for the methods contained in this class includes briefs descriptions of the implementations. Such descriptions should be regarded as implementation notes, rather than parts of specifications
    Author:
    Andres Felipe Rincon Gamboa
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PowerUp

        public PowerUp()
        Default constructor for the PowerUp object. Calls the parent constructor of the PowerUp

      • PowerUp

        public PowerUp(int xPos,
               int yPos,
               java.lang.String locationImage,
               PowerUpType namePowerUp,
               java.lang.String typeObject)
        This constructor creates a PowerUp object given the arguments passed as input.
        Parameters:
        xPos - integer position representing the x position of the power up on the x axis.
        yPos - integer position representing the y position of the power up on the y axis.
        locationImage - string representing the location of the image.
        namePowerUp - PowerUpType object representing the power up type.
        typeObject - String object representing the type of object. In this case, it should always be "PowerUp"

    • Method Detail

      • setPowerUp

        public void setPowerUp(PowerUpType type)
        This method sets the type of the power up.
        Parameters:
        type - a PowerUp type object that is used to set the power up type.

      • getPowerUpType

        public PowerUpType getPowerUpType()
        This method returns the PowerUpType object of the power up.
        Returns:
        PowerUp type object representing the type of the power up.
